title: Who are some famous  sports persons  of our age who wear glasses or lenses? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many NBA basketball players wear sports goggles while playing:1. Kareem Abdul-Jabbar2. James Worthy3. Kurt Rambis4. Thurl Bailey5. Hakeem Olajuwon6. Buck Williams7. Horace Grant8. Bo Outlaw9. Ben Wallace10. Amar'e Stoudemire And some like Russell Westbrook and Kevin Durant wear glasses without lenses for fashion.
